params.name: server_url
params.label: URL
params.description:
URL of your Tableau server without subpaths. 
For local Tableau servers, an example would be: https://www.MY_SERVER.com. For Tableau Online, 
an example would be: https://10ax.online.tableau.com/.

params.name: site_id
params.label: Site ID
params.description: The site_id is the subpath of your full site URL. (See the README.md for details)
